data.text:
It’s your funeral...

#MusicToBeMurderedBy Out Now - https://t.co/q4TAFJUVGV https://t.co/6PqnTjCKgu
Happy b day 2 @triggertreach 1 of the greatest rappers of all time!!..I’m still tryin 2 catch up 2 the greatness of the last vs on "Craziest"!!!

.@DBGDetroit needs your support to continue to help knockout COVID in Detroit- the MMF x DBG #Stan #MMLP20 collab on @Carhartt gear to raise funds is available for Black Friday starting now! https://t.co/Sulsx44qqE https://t.co/crGoQHMkOb
WTF- who did this? https://t.co/CLqGZba96Z
So happy for @Royceda59 and @Alchemist on their Grammy rap album of the year noms! Seems like @RecordingAcad might be starting to get it right. https://t.co/osRO36B6VU
"You waited this long.." 📺 @Eminem’s #WithoutMe just hit 1 billion views and it's now in HD - https://t.co/hS34WCgaFC @YouTube https://t.co/RI9L6twugL
One opportunity... #Vote https://t.co/sCUhq4dvAN
“This will be the last package I ever send your ass” #MMLP20 Capsule Live - https://t.co/rniTC6KScx https://t.co/msjumcHPL1

Another safe way to vote! @MakeHistoryHere rallied with the @NBA, @MLB, @NFL, @NHL and @MLS to open up arenas and stadiums for safer voting - their site has all the info - https://t.co/MSn6jW2R9S https://t.co/y5Ys52zSi7
Paul wants to hear your bars but they better be good 💀 TRUST ME.  Hit up @rosenberg via the @audiomack  #STAMPED contest and learn more on their site - https://t.co/HJmqtXPenp https://t.co/JcZ3p0HkrP
"May I have your attention please?" #MMLP20 capsule hits the store Thursday - sign up for first access. https://t.co/SmgPZjA341 https://t.co/I2wT6mdi5X
My concert DJ and cohort @Alchemist just dropped his new project The Food Villain - hit up ALC Records to pick it up! https://t.co/pmG6V7JyTh https://t.co/RCSLZLIKIL

Hit your favorite record shop to get the all-NEW @recordstoreday exclusive My Name Is / Bad Guys Always Die 7” - their site has all participating stores https://t.co/kUvWXdkQFk https://t.co/siapCSqsLP

#DETROIT @WhenWeAllVote is making dropping off your ballot so easy tomorrow - free food, local dj’s and more at the ballot drop-off location at Henry Ford @DetroitPistons  Performance arena!  Hit the link for more info  https://t.co/A2x9BTdEAo https://t.co/7YaLzcmRlB
Tune into @shade45 today! @eminem @DJWhooKid 12-6pm ET https://t.co/zR8o8YlS2Q
Michigan voices are more important than ever this election - get out and vote! https://t.co/34kUMgNEUk
#WHOMADETHESUNSHINE @WestsideGunn’s Shady solo debut is here! Stream now https://t.co/l6VvGz2ij1 https://t.co/bjzIA3Z3FU
Proud of Matt for writing this, everyone needs to use their platform to speak out. #BlackLivesMatter https://t.co/OiELMK1qM9
So happy to be a part of the sequel- @BigSean #Detroit2 #fridaynightcypher https://t.co/S4sge6wAqd https://t.co/Q83N1CXj5R
Honored to be @YoungMAMusic’s first guest on her new radio show- check it out! @applemusic https://t.co/ve0lTS0gzn https://t.co/FmsenjCExf
Vote for Sway! https://t.co/p4S36kWBlP
"This is just the song to go ballistic on" 🦖 the soundtrack for #UFC4 just dropped - https://t.co/4yotS2c9Qt #Godzilla https://t.co/F0EuRyXSOY
#Godzilla video is up for a couple @MTV #VMAs - "Video of the Year" and "Best Hip Hop". Cast your vote - https://t.co/cKpzdJTvMe 🦖 @Eminem https://t.co/FVbTcnDPdQ
“Fuck's going on, man?” @KidCudi  #TheAdventuresOfMoonManAndSlimShady stream now - https://t.co/z1uAjXEs6f https://t.co/XoF9zrtuVe
Me and moon man got vinyl, cassettes and merch for our collab @kidcudi - https://t.co/0end22ERri https://t.co/qN2wNcDrN4
Hazmat suit rap @KidCudi  #TheAdventuresOfMoonManAndSlimShady stream now - https://t.co/j6BTJG56uA https://t.co/b3szeequnt
Me and Moon Man @KidCudi got something coming tonight! https://t.co/qESgJbdYLK
In response to @revolttv... https://t.co/XrFJi2BZDy
STOP HAVING A BORING LIFE! 💥💿💥Revisit the #EmWow with @realvinceoffer video on the site - https://t.co/NXTYVvEaGA #RECOVERY10 https://t.co/PHuEEWgkoY
#NotAfraid #Recovery10 Hit the store for limited 24-hr 10th anniversary merch - https://t.co/NXTYVvVM5a https://t.co/HCICessshA
Really happy and lucky to have @Royceda59 on board with the #MarshallMathersFoundation to help us reach new goals. Read more on the site. https://t.co/biVUFjGPUF https://t.co/TqvSAkqm0O
"Music is my time machine" ⚡️️#RECOVERY10 more coming Monday! https://t.co/pZPVA2yOpU

warning you may laugh at this, 😉 
great delivery 💣 #bransoncognac https://t.co/nmdwUk7ABu
We will be closed on Black Out Tuesday.  Join us in fighting for change. #TheShowMustBePaused #BlackLivesMatter #BlackOutTuesday https://t.co/Gdy2YLXBTv
I’m with @killermike on this one. Incredibly well done.  https://t.co/zeTQYqyk9H
Unity in Detroit is more important than ever. #EverybodyVsCovid19 tune in to @cityofdetroit now - https://t.co/aXf0ck66JS https://t.co/RySppEQnhY
Speak up #untouchable https://t.co/GxxfjwlFd0 https://t.co/6TgtZ3Voon

“Sometimes I wanna get on TV and just let loose
But can't, but it's cool for @tomgreenlive to hump a dead moose” - MMLP music videos newly remastered in HD on the site! #MMLP20 https://t.co/Gc0a4dxJql @youtubemusic https://t.co/eJK0ML4KB4
If you missed yesterday’s MMLP20 Listening Party, check a recap of Eminem’s live chat with fans!  https://t.co/EsrLmkQJzH https://t.co/E2byXKBFiR
Sincerely yours #MMLP20 #STAN https://t.co/DczB7IdK2s https://t.co/20wF1rhtlf
